meanings.definition: The part of a golf club that strikes the ball.
meanings.sent1: The golfer carefully aligned the clubface before taking the shot.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the clubface is clean to avoid any interference with your swing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran off with the clubface cover, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a perfectly angled clubface, always hitting the mark.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming clubface reflected the sunlight, dazzling everyone on the course.

meanings.definition: The surface of the club that makes contact with the ball.
meanings.sent1: The clubface of his driver had a unique design for better aerodynamics.
meanings.sent2: When practicing, focus on hitting the ball with the center of the clubface.
meanings.sent3: In a playful mood, she pretended the clubface was a spaceship exploring the green.
meanings.sent4: His words had the impact of a clubface meeting a golf ball at full speed.
meanings.sent5: The precision of his swing matched the precision of the clubface, resulting in a perfect shot.
